articles.description: A new COVID symptom for the aftermath of COVID-19 has been identified. What is parosmia? What does it do?
articles.content:
Many people across the world are reporting a new symptom they experience after recovering from COVID-19 parosmia, or a condition that distorts your smell.
Whats going on?
